entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -37.9°C

Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 12:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:08 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
